Articles.Content:
Jebediah: Why did we come here?

Bob: We are farming exp.

Bill: What is exp?

Oh my gosh, that pic is amazing. I don't know what it is, but as Paramecium put it the amount of flags is insane.

Also, I've been seeing reflections on Kerbals' helmets much as they seem to be doing in this screenshot. What is that from, Astronomer's Interstellar visual pack?

Oh my gosh, that pic is amazing. I don't know what it is, but as Paramecium put it the amount of flags is insane.

Like the text eluded to, it's just a really fast way to level up my Kerbals to two stars. Pile them all in one craft, head to Minmus and the Mun, plant a flag with each on each.

Also, I've been seeing reflections on Kerbals' helmets much as they seem to be doing in this screenshot. What is that from, Astronomer's Interstellar visual pack?

Texture Replacer, AVP Interstellar uses Texture Replacer but if all you want is the reflections, you don't need AVP.

Edited February 2, 2015 by Alshain
